amendment.description: To authorize the transfer of the proceeds of certain forfeited property to help Ukraine recover from the harms caused by the ongoing Russian aggression.

vote.text: Amendment SA 6596 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 6596 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Graham to Amendment SA 6552. (consideration: CR S10063, S10071-10072; text as modified: CR S10072) To authorize the transfer of the proceeds of certain forfeited property to help Ukraine recover from the harms caused by the ongoing Russian aggression.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 6596 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Graham to Amendment SA 6552.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 6596 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
